characters.name: Norman
characters.description:
__Height:__ 145 cm
__Farm Identifier:__ 22194

Norman seems to be logical, well-meaning, and devoted, with a slightly naive side. He can easily plan his actions in advance and he anticipates on other's actions. He is one of the top 3 ranking orphans, along with [Emma](https://anilist.co/character/121725/Emma) and [Ray](https://anilist.co/character/121724/Ray). Norman loves Emma and he is helpful and loyal towards her.

characters.name: Ray
characters.description:
__Height:__ 150 cm
__Farm Identifier:__ 81194

As one of the three perfect students at the orphanage, Ray is very logical, smart, cunning, extremely patient and is usually shown to read books by himself. Although he is extremely book smart he says that he never liked to study. According to data obtained by sister [Krone](https://anilist.co/character/121702/Krone), his weakness is that he gives up easily.

characters.name: Emma
characters.description:
__Height:__ 145 cm
__Farm Identifier:__ 63194

Emma acts as an older sister to the other children and loves her family very intensely. She is sweet, heroic, caring, and has a big heart. She can also be naive and reckless, and doesn't hesitate to put herself at risk to ensure the safety of the group. The other kids describe her as having monster reflexes and an astounding ability to learn, which enables her to think fast in difficult situations and makes her a very good strategist. She could be considered a beacon of hope for the rest of the children.

characters.name: Isabella
characters.description:
__Height:__ 170 cm
__Farm Identifier:__ 73584

Isabella worked as a Mama at Grace Field House, taking care of the orphans that reside within.

characters.name: Krone
characters.description: Sister Krone runs the Grace Field House orphanage with [Madam Isabella](https://anilist.co/character/121701/Isabella). She has the desire to usurp the position of "Mama" from Isabella.

characters.name: Don
characters.description:
__Age (2045):__ 10 yo
__Farm Identifier:__ 16194
__D.O.B:__ 2035/7/4
__Height (2045-2049):__ 155 - 174 cm

Don has dark skin and a tall and slender appearance. He has short, messy black hair with an undercut and brown eyes. He wears the standard white uniform. Like [Emma](https://anilist.co/character/121725/Emma), Don cares deeply about his siblings. Don is portrayed as a cheerful and slightly careless boy, however, he too is fairly intelligent, coming around 5th place in the everyday test, after [Gilda](https://anilist.co/character/126455/Gilda). He also has talents in pick pocketing. His physical ability is also fairly strong.

characters.name: Gilda
characters.description:
__Farm Identifier:__ 65194
__Height (2045-2049):__ 138 - 155 cm

Gilda has short olive drab hair kept in a Chinese bob hairstyle and wears circular-lensed glasses. Gilda is an intuitive young girl. She also has a caring personality. She seems to be an introvert, however she also has her moments of bravery. She can also be quite threatening.

characters.name: Phil
characters.description:
__Height:__ 100 cm
__Farm Identifier:__ 34394 (Grace Field House)
__D.O.B:__ 2041

Phil is very active and can always be seen running around. 
~!He is also shown to be very mature and intelligent for his age, even suspecting something was wrong when Emma and the other older orphans were trying to find out ways to escape.!~

characters.name: Violet
characters.description:
__Farm Identifier:__ DIV332-198 (Grand Valley)
__D.O.B:__ Unknown
__Hair Color:__ Purple
__Eye Color:__ Purple

Violet is a former orphan from the Grand Valley orphanage and a member of the Goldy Pond Resistance. Violet is the first person to encounter Emma at Goldy Pond.

characters.name: Leuvis
characters.description:
One of the antagonists of The Promised Neverland. He belonged to the group of Demons called the Poachers. It was later revealed that he served as a purveyor for the Grand Valley orphanage who delivers the children to Goldy Pond.

Lewis was a tall and slender demon with three fingers on each hand, and three toes on each foot. His entire body is clothed and he wears a high collar cape over it. He also wears a matching top hat decorated with rope-like looms. Just like most other demons, his face is covered with a mask with four holes on top of each other with the upper three allowing him to see, and the bottom one which revealed his sharp canines.

He also owns a pet named Parvus which is often seen on his shoulder. It has two eyes (one on top and a much bigger one below) and the physical features of a monkey, and it wears a tiny crown on top of its head.

~!It was revealed that he is also the older brother of Sonju.!~

~!The features that lies under his mask were revealed when the man successfully shot and broke his mask. He bears the appearance of other demons of his kind, with 3 vertically positioned eyes on his face, and sharp canines.!~

characters.name: Nouma
characters.description:
Sometime in the past, she and Nous moved to Goldy Pond, where they became a part of the famous hunting group called the Poachers.
Nouma has a black-colored humanoid body and has a mask. Nouma appears to have a rather large cleavage and she can be seen wielding a large spear.
Like Nous, she is a really sadistic demon who enjoys to hunt on little children and to kill them in cold blood.

characters.name: Nous
characters.description:
Nous is a black demon, with a tall, slender humanoid body. On his face he has a bulletproof mask, which protects his eyes

~!Nous is one of the antagonists during the Goldy Pond Arc. He belongs to the group of "Poachers", who organized illegal hunting trips inside the secret garden of Goldy Pond. He very often hunted in pairs with his sister [Nouma](https://anilist.co/character/126492/Nouma). He was killed in chapter 86, "Battle power" by a gunshot to the eye, fired by Yuugo.!~

characters.name: James Ratri
alt_names: ジェイムズ・ラートリー
William Minerva (ウィリアム・ミネルヴァ)
characters.description:
James Latley is the 35th descendant of the Latley Clan who sealed the promise between humans and demons 1000 years ago. After seeing the horrors that humans has been through, he decided to give them a chance to live.

He put several codes inside his books so the kids could escape the plantations.

~!The elevator inside Golden Pond is not working anymore, so he said that others can be used, including the one in the Grace Field house. He was betrayed by a person, and so, the Village is not a safe place anymore. The last recording that Emma and Lucas found said that it was the 20th of March, 2031. He is presumed dead.!~

characters.name: Peter Ratri
characters.description: Peter Ratri is the 36th and current head of the famous Ratri Clan and the younger brother of James Ratri.

characters.name: Luce
characters.description:
Luce lived in Goldy Pond were he belonged to the group of demons called the Poachers.
Luce was a tiny, white-coloured demon. He had over 20 eyes and razor-sharp teeth. He wore a mask which displayed 6 of his eyes. The mask had two horns on top of it before it was shattered by Gillian.

characters.name: Sonju
characters.description:
__Age:__ At-Least 1000
__Hair Color:__ Red
__Eye Color:__ Black

Sonju (or Sung-Joo) is a demon that lives outside Grace Field House. ~!He saved Ray just before he was captured by his demon-hound pursuers. He and Mujika were suspected to be demons by Ray.
Sonju believes in the same religion as Mujika, hence is strongly against the practice of eating humans. However, Sonju remained reluctant and was eager to resume his intention of eating humans once their population increased.!~ Sonju retains a stoic and composed personality, as he sometimes refrained himself from interacting with the orphans, and during the times when he does, he was known to intimidate them due to his appearance. Nevertheless, Sonju on a certain degree still care for the orphans' safety and have faith in them being able to break the promise.

characters.name: Mujika
characters.description:
Mujika (or Musica) is a demon descent traveling in the forest outside the Grace Field House. ~!She saved Emma and the other orphans of Grace Field House from the pursuing demons. She, together with Sonju believe in a religious principle to not eat humans.!~

~!She is considered the "Evil Blooded Girl" because if her blood is consumed by a demon, it will make them be able to not eat humans and still keep their form!~

Mujika has long, purple hair braided pigtails covering parts of her horns, and wears a mask with two holes positioned vertically. She has a pale complexion and wears a bluish-white cloak.

~!She later is crowned as the new Demon Queen!~

characters.name: Sonya
characters.description:
__Farm Identifier:__ EIV019-270 (Grand Valley)
__D.O.B:__ Unknown
__Hair Color:__ Blue
__Eye Color:__ Gray

Sonya is a former orphan from the Grand Valley orphanage and the Second-in-Command of the Goldy Pond Resistance. She wears glasses and has blue hair done up in pigtails.

characters.name: Bayon
characters.description:
Bayon  is one of the antagonists of The Promised Neverland. He belongs to the group of Demons known as the "Poachers" and is the owner of the secret human hunting reserve Goldy Pond.
He likes to play and hunt and has his attendants carry him.

characters.name: Jake
characters.description:
__Farm Identifier:__ Unknown (Grand Valley)

Jake was a former orphan from the Grand Valley orphanage that was found in Goldy Pond.

characters.name: Lucas
characters.description:
__Age:__ Around 29
__Farm Identifier:__ KGX2A7 (Glory Bell)
__D.O.B:__ Unknown

Lucas is an escapee from Glory Bell and a friend of Shelter B06-32 Unnamed Man (Yuugo). He was captured by the Poachers in Goldy Pond when he and his friends traveled to the human reserve in hope of finding William Minerva. He then seemingly died at the hands of the Poachers.

characters.name: Ojisan
characters.description:
__Farm Identifier:__ ETR3M8 (Glory Bell)

~!He is one of the escapees from the Glory Bell orphanage which he escaped 13 years ago. He now lives in an isolated shelter that was formerly owned by William Minerva. He is also the presumed sole survivor of Goldy Pond.!~

characters.name: Anna
characters.description:
__Age (2045):__ 9 yo
__Farm Identifier:__ 48194 (Grace Field House)
__D.O.B:__ 2036/4/25
__Height (2045-2049):__ 135 - 162 cm 

Just like every other orphans of Grace Field, she wears the standard Grace Field Orphanage uniform. Anna grows to be a surprisingly big boned, tall girl. She has blonde hair tied into twin braids. 
~!Later, she cuts her hair in order to help with the escape.!~~!During her time at the B06-32 shelter, she spends a lot of time studying medicine in order to help her family.!~

characters.name: Gillian
characters.description:
Gillian is an orphan from the Grand Valley orphanage. She was transferred to the Goldy Pond hunting ground as potential prey, where she witnessed the death of her beloved sister by the hands of the Poachers. Determined for vengeance, Gillian joined the Goldy Pond Resistance, where she ended up in charge of the provisions.

Gillian is a high-spirited and outgoing teenage girl, which thus made her stood out from the rest of the members of the Goldy Pond Resistance, whom are mostly serious in nature. This was evident when she and Sandy are the liveliest among the team members when [Violet](https://anilist.co/character/126490/Violet) introduced them to [Emma](https://anilist.co/character/121725/Emma).

(Source: The Promised Neverland Wiki)

characters.name: Lannion
characters.description:
__Age (2045):__ 7 yo
__Farm Identifier:__ 54294 (Grace Field House)
__D.O.B:__ 2038/4/28
__Height (2045-2049):__ 125 - 144 cm 

Lani is a mischievous and resourceful boy, who enjoys pulling pranks with his best friend, [Thoma](https://anilist.co/character/129784/Thoma). He is a bit cowardly, but also blunt and straightforward.

characters.name: Thoma
characters.description:
__Height:__ 123 cm
__Farm Identifier:__ 55294 (Grace Field House)

Thoma is a resourceful and mischievous boy, who enjoys pulling pranks alongside his best friend [Lani](https://anilist.co/character/129783). He is blunt, but can also be quite cowardly.

characters.name: Conny
characters.description:
__Height:__ 115cm
__Farm Identifier:__ 48294

Conny is nice and lovely towards Emma, Don and the other orphans. She always carried her stuffed rabbit Little Bernie around with her. Her intellect level seemed to be average for her age.

characters.name: Nat
characters.description:
__Age (2045):__ 9 yo
__Farm Identifier:__ 48194 (Grace Field House)
__D.O.B:__ 2036/12/18
__Height (2045-2049):__ 133 - 156 cm

Nat is a rather frail boy, with brown eyes and a tall nose line (which he takes great pride in).  He wears the standard orphanage uniform. Even though he can be easily intimidated, he does have his moments of bravery.

characters.name: Zack
characters.description: Zack is a former orphan from the Grand Valley orphanage and a member of the Goldy Pond Resistance who is in charge of relief in Goldy Pond.

characters.name: Sobo
characters.description:
Grandmother is a high-ranking human and once worked as [Isabella's](https://anilist.co/character/121701/Isabella) Mama although she treated her more as a pawn than a human. 

~!On January 27, 2046, it was revealed that all of Isabella's mistakes and responsibilities, as in letting the children escape, were placed on Grandma Sarah. Although Isabella wasn't able to manage her products, Sarah wasn't able to manage Isabella. As a result, Sarah was shipped out to be served at the upcoming Tifari in order to make up for the escapees. Isabella took the role of Grandmother after that.!~

characters.name: Ayshe
characters.description: ~! Ayshe was stolen by a demon working at a farm, the demon raised her until the demon was slain by Norman and his team. Ayshe hates the people who killed her parent, she doesn't speak the human language around anyone that supports them. !~

characters.name: Hayato
characters.description:
Farm Identifier: 01

Hayato is very cheerful, energetic and a bit jumpy, and often reacts as a normal person would in most situations. Despite his fearfulness, however, he's shown to be kind, loyal and trustworthy based on his actions of helping them get Chris' medicine and helping Ray with the demons.

characters.name: Zazie
characters.description: Zazie is a former Λ7214 experiment. He is the strongest among the humans. He gets mad when he doesn't wear the paper bag. He loves his boss, Norman.

characters.name: Oliver
characters.description: Oliver is an orphan who was shipped out of the Grand Valley orphanage by Leuvis. He was moved over to Goldy Pond, where he became one of the leaders of the Goldy Pond Resistance organization together with Lucas.

characters.name: Cislo
characters.description: Cislo is a former Lambda 7214 (aka Λ7214) experiment. His hobby is weight training, despite his looks he is easily moved to tears and he loves boss(Norman) . He was shipped to Lambda at age 12/13 from Goodwill Ridge, along with his close friend Barbara. Goodwill is one of the four premium farms.

characters.name: Vincent
characters.description: Vincent is a previous Lambda 7214 (aka Λ7214) experiment. He was born in Glory bell. He is known to have medical knowledge and is very fashionable. Also he can make snacks , cloths and weapons. He loves boss(aka Norman).

characters.name: Barbara
characters.description:
Barbara is a former Lambda 7214 (aka Λ7214) experiment. She eats a lot, and as a result of the experiments that were done on her she has inherited superhuman strength. At age 12, she was shipped from Goodwill Ridge to Lambda along with her close friend Cislo. Goodwill is one of the four premium farms.

~!She likes to eat demon meat because she is "pissed off" that humans are the only ones getting eaten. It seems to be safe to do, as she shows no symptoms of it affecting her.!~

characters.name: Nigel
characters.description: Nigel is an orphan from the Grand Valley orphanage and the former mechanic of the Goldy Pond Resistance. He's also in charge of the ammo stockpile.

characters.name: Leslie
characters.description:
__Farm Identifier:__ 71584

Leslie was Isabella's childhood friend and is shown to be very kind and loves music.

characters.name: Yvette
characters.description:
__Farm Identifier:__ 59294
__Height:__ 110 - 133 cm

Yvette is a smart and observant girl who is very artistic. She carries a pencil and a block with her.
~!Once they escape, she helps to collect food and draws maps when asked.!~

characters.name: Christie
characters.description:
__Farm Identifier:__ 70394 (Grace Field House)
__Height (2045):__ 103 cm 

Chris is a curious young boy, who is very cheerful and outspoken.

characters.name: Jemima
characters.description:
__Age (2045):__ 5 yo
__Farm Identifier:__ 31394 (Grace Field House)
__Height (2045-2049):__ 107 - 134 cm 

Jemima is cheerful and well-behaved. Though, she can display acts of mischievousness. She is seen to have a strong bond with [Alicia](https://anilist.co/character/199115).

characters.name: Alicia
characters.description:
__Height:__ 109cm
__Farm Identifier:__ 71394 (Grace Field House)

Alicia is a cheerful, extroverted young girl with a tomboyish personality. She can also be sneaky, and knows how to stand up for herself. She is shown to have a strong bond with [Jemima](https://anilist.co/character/199114/Jemima).

characters.name: Rossi
characters.description:
__Age (2045):__ 5 yo
__Farm Identifier:__ 50394 (Grace Field House)
__D.O.B:__ 2040/4/14
__Height (2045-2049):__ 108 - 130 cm 

Rossi is a delicate and prudent boy, but he can also be quite mischievous.

characters.name: Dominic
characters.description:
__Farm Identifier:__ 07294 (Grace Field House)
__Height (2045-2049):__ 119 - 147 cm 

Dominic is an energetic and rather muscular young boy. He is very brave as well as caring towards others, and is willing to risk much to make sure everyone is safe.

characters.name: Legravalima
characters.description:
Legravalima is the Queen of the Demon World. She is the main antagonist of the Imperial Capital Battle Arc.
~!It is later revealed that Sonju and Leuvis are her younger brothers.!~

characters.name: Pepe
characters.description: Pepe is a 16-year-old boy born and raised at Grand Valley Orphanage with the ID number PX363-076. He was shipped out to Goldy Pond to become prey for the Poachers to hunt. After arriving in Goldy Pond, he joined the Goldy Pond Resistance, where he ended up in charge of the provisions. Pepe has dark skin and dark hair worn in a ponytail. He also wears an eyeglass. He is hardworking, resourceful and confident. Pepe and Zack are assigned to keep Bayon busy during the uprising. Like all the other kids in Goldy Pond, he cares deeply for his comrades and hates to see them injured. Pepe was shown to be on good terms with them despite how he only joined not long ago. He is also very skilled at creative cooking.

characters.name: Paula
characters.description: Paula is a 17-year-old girl born and raised at Grand Valley Orphanage with the ID number AXI640-651. She was shipped out to Goldy Pond to become prey for the Poachers to hunt. After arriving in Goldy Pond, she joined the Goldy Pond Resistance, where she ended up in charge of the provisions. Paula is a fair-skinned girl with long, black hair partially done up. She dresses in dark clothes and wears a bandanna covering her mouth. Paula is loyal and caring like all the Goldy Pond kids. However, she is reserved and doesn't talk much. Paula is skilled in sniping Demons with her gun.

characters.name: Oni no Chouten
characters.description:
Him is seemingly the God of all Demons and the Demon World. However, his real name can’t be translated.

He lives in a special dimension where the laws of time and physics do not apply; said to be located in a mysterious space with a dragon. Anyone who tries to contact Him must need to go through a special ritual and trial that involves strange metaphysical puzzles. ~!He is the one capable of making promises in this world.!~
